alert.note: Alert for Butler; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 1:42PM CST until January 12 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Butler County in south central Alabama... Northeastern Monroe County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 230 PM CST. * At 142 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Vredenburgh, or 7 miles south of Camden, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Camden, Vredenburgh and Pine Apple. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
